caption.title: Pseudoternary phase diagrams for the formulas (The shaded region represents the O/W microemulsion region).
caption.p: (A) IPM/Cremophor RH40/PEG400 system; (B) IPM/Cremophor RH40/ Anhydrous ethanol system;(C) IPM/Cremophor RH40/ Propylene glycol; (D) IPM/Cremophor EL/PEG400 system; â‚¬IPM/Cremophor EL/ Anhydrous ethanol system; (F) IPM/Cremophor EL/ Propylene glycol.
